title: Waste in learning in traditional education.
description: Waste in learning in traditional education. Take lecture -> remove "fluff" (pauses, technical issues) -> clarify speech (professor with bad accent) -> extract questions for active learning. Personalize the content to your understanding adding analogies. Skip questions asked in the class that you already know. Play it back later, faster speed. Make more active. For classes that are in person, record them yourself, or take audio and match it with slides. Take in the syllabus and supporting documents and create relationships between them.

title: "relationship tracker" -> looks at conversations on multiple platforms, tries to extract who you ...
description: "relationship tracker" -> looks at conversations on multiple platforms, tries to extract who you are communicating with what platofmr, and then allow you to query your own network. Apply ideas from "never-eat-alone" [[relationship-crm]] - Realted, LinkedIn/contacts, get their names, pfp, convos, etc. and then allow the user to write about their network so they can later query it. - store information like where they work, where they have worked in the past, where they live, what school they've gone to, be able to query based on location. - when ranking people, keep a running tally of how you've ranked people in the past, show them to the user, so they can judge roughly how people stack up - store all people you follow/whose content you consume so that in the future when you go to some place you can see if you can meet them.
